signature: MultiValuedMap<K, V> transformedMultiValuedMap(MultiValuedMap<K, V>, Transformer<? super K, ? extends K>, Transformer<? super V, ? extends V>)

enhanced_by.reason: Creating a new ListValuedMap can be used to test the transformation of a MultiValuedMap.
Creating a new SetValuedHashMap can be used to test the transformation of a MultiValuedMap.
Both methods return a decorated MultiValuedMap, making it useful for asserting the transformed state.
Verifying if the transformed map is empty can help in asserting the transformation results.
